name: .AI File Extension
summary: Learn about .AI files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open an AI file with Adobe Illustrator in Windows and macOS. Illustrator is the best option for opening AI files because it fully supports the formatting of Illustrator artwork. To open an AI file with Illustrator, select File â†’ Open.

You can also open AI files with other third-party applications, such as ACD Systems Canvas (Windows), CorelDRAW Graphics Suite (Windows and macOS), GIMP (multiplatform), and Inkscape (multiplatform). Remember that these applications may not fully support the AI format, or they may rasterize the image, meaning the vector data will be converted to a bitmap format.
ðŸ’¡ If you are a Mac user, you can also view AI files with Apple Preview, which is bundled with macOS.
Several applications, including Adobe Illustrator, CorelDRAW Graphics Suite, and Inkscape, can convert AI files to other formats.
For example, Adobe Illustrator can convert AI files to many file types, including the following formats:
